description: Significant events from Medieval European history

events.name: Charlemagne Crowned Emperor
events.description: Charlemagne crowned Holy Roman Emperor by Pope Leo III, reviving the concept of empire in Western Europe

events.name: Viking Raid on Lindisfarne
events.description: Viking raid on the monastery of Lindisfarne, traditionally marking the beginning of the Viking Age

events.name: Battle of Hastings
events.description: William the Conqueror defeats King Harold II, leading to the Norman conquest of England

events.name: First Crusade Begins
events.description: Pope Urban II calls for the First Crusade to recapture the Holy Land from Muslim control

events.name: Signing of the Magna Carta
events.description: King John of England signs the Magna Carta, limiting royal power and establishing principles of constitutional law

events.name: Black Death Reaches Europe
events.description: The bubonic plague reaches Europe, killing an estimated one-third of the European population

events.name: Fall of Constantinople
events.description: Ottoman Empire conquers Constantinople, ending the Byzantine Empire and medieval period
